survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers about their satisfaction with our home cleaning services, identifying areas for improvement and strengths.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of our home cleaning service?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels consistently.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of our home cleaning service?

questions.question_text: Which of the following cleaning tasks were performed to your satisfaction? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to identify specific strengths.

script.question_text: Which of the following cleaning tasks were performed to your satisfaction? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the punctuality of our cleaning staff?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to measure punctuality perception.

script.question_text: How would you rate the punctuality of our cleaning staff?

questions.question_text: Were there any issues or concerns during your most recent cleaning service?
questions.client_notes: Binary question to filter for follow-up if 'Yes' is selected.

script.question_text: Were there any issues or concerns during your most recent cleaning service?

questions.question_text: Please describe the issue or concern you encountered.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture detailed feedback for improvement.

script.question_text: Please describe the issue or concern you encountered.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our home cleaning service to others?
questions.client_notes: Net Promoter Score (NPS) style question to gauge loyalty.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our home cleaning service to others?

questions.question_text: What additional services would you like us to offer?
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice with 'Other' option to capture unmet needs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with optional open text (MULTI_CHOICE).

script.question_text: What additional services would you like us to offer?

questions.question_text: Please specify the 'Other' service you would like us to offer.
questions.client_notes: Capture custom responses for service expansion.

script.question_text: Please specify the 'Other' service you would like us to offer.

questions.question_text: How often do you use our home cleaning services?
questions.client_notes: Identify frequency to tailor marketing or loyalty programs.

script.question_text: How often do you use our home cleaning services?

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you chose our home cleaning service?
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with optional open text (SINGLE_CHOICE).

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you chose our home cleaning service?

questions.question_text: Please specify the 'Other' reason for choosing our service.
questions.client_notes: Capture custom responses for marketing insights.

script.question_text: Please specify the 'Other' reason for choosing our service.
